subject: Question about simsonn gt2
description_text:
Dear Simsonn staff
I have a quick release simagic, i can put it behind the hub and connect it trought usb to the simagic alpha right?
Inviato da raffaele

conversations.body_text: Hi raffaele federico,  If your Simagic Alpha functions as a USB hub, our steering wheel’s USB data cable can be connected to it directly.
